LanguageData.VVE_Bunsen_MainTurret.label: вогнемет "Жарка"
LanguageData.VVE_Bunsen_MainTurret.description: A lightly-armored medium range flamethrower turret usually mounted on bunsen tanks. Takes fuel directly from the chemtank of the vehicle. Quite devastating against infantry, bunsen flamethrower struggles against armored targets.
LanguageData.VVE_Bunsen_MainTurret.fireModes.0.label: Викид вогню
